PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_MarineVehicleCommon
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties common to the definition of all occurrences of _IfcTransportElement_ and types of _IfcTransportElementType_ with the predefined type set to VEHICLEMARINE.

PropertyDef.Name: LengthBetweenPerpendiculars
PropertyDef.Definition: Length of vessel from rudder shaft to crossing point of the bow and the loaded waterline.

PropertyDef.Name: VesselDepth
PropertyDef.Definition: Depth of the vessel from the main deck to the keel.

PropertyDef.Name: VesselDraft
PropertyDef.Definition: Depth of vessel from the waterline to the keel (LightShip, Ballasted, Maximum)

PropertyDef.Name: AboveDeckProjectedWindEnd
PropertyDef.Definition: End on projected windage area above the main deck

PropertyDef.Name: AboveDeckProjectedWindSide
PropertyDef.Definition: Side on projected windage area above the main deck

PropertyDef.Name: Displacement
PropertyDef.Definition: Weight of water displaced by the vessel

PropertyDef.Name: LaneMeters
PropertyDef.Definition: Length of lanes accommodating vehicles on roll-on, roll-off vessels
